deshapalana balapamwalin kridawa nidahas karaganime aramunin yuthuwa siya samajika ratawalata me niyogaya panawu jathyanthara krikat kawunsilaya deshapalana madahathwimwalin nidahas wimata apohosath wuwahoth sambadhaka panawana bawa da prakasha kaleya.ee ee ratawala krikat palaka mandalawala swadhinathwaya udesa nidahas nilawarana pawathwana lesa eeye honkon nuwaradi niwedanayak nikuth karamin jathyanthara krikat kawunsilaya danwa sitiyeya.2012 wasare juni masaye pawathwimata niyamitha jathyanthara krikat kawunsilaye warshika samuluwata pera ema niyogaya anuwa katayuthu kirimata siyalu samajika ratawal kamaththa palakara thibe.kese wuwada ee wanawitath deshapalana madahathwimwalin krikat kridawa nidahas kara ganimata apohosath wana samajika ratawalwalata sambadhaka panawimata pera 2013 wasare juni masaya dakwa kalaya dirgha karana bawa jathyanthara krikat kawunsila niwedanaye wadiduratath sandahan we.
